input.sentences: today [female] is 2 years old | for her special day | she will sit in a very fancy chair . she will wear a very beautiful dress .
an artist painted a tiny nemo clownfish on her hand .
the artist also painted a flower on [female] 's face .
mom helped [female] blow the candles out on her cake .
mommy and daddy are so proud of their darling [female] .
output.sentences: It was babys first birthday and grandma came to visit.
She painted babys hands in the culture of her people.
And her face was painted too.
Mommy put her in the high chair for birthday cake.
Her parents proudly posed with a picture of the 1 year old baby.
